chapter.text: ha-mim
tenzilu-lkitabi mine-llahi-l`azizi-l`alim
gafiri-zzembi vekabili-ttevbi sedidi-l`ikabi zi-ttavl. la ilahe illa hu. ileyhi-lmesir
ma yucadilu fi ayati-llahi ille-llezine keferu fela yagrurke tekallubuhum fi-lbilad
kezzebet kablehum kavmu nuhiv vel'ahzabu mim ba`dihim. vehemmet kullu ummetim birasulihim liye'huzuhu vecadelu bilbatili liyudhidu bihi-lhakka feehaztuhum. fekeyfe kane `ikab
vekezalike hakkat kelimetu rabbike `ale-llezine keferu ennehum ashabu-nnar

ellezine yahmilune-l`arse vemen havlehu yusebbihune bihamdi rabbihim veyu'minune bihi veyestagfirune lillezine amenu. rabbena vesi`te kulle sey'ir rahmetev ve`ilmen fagfir lillezine tabu vettebe`u sebileke vekihim `azabe-lcehim
rabbena veedhilhum cennati `adnini-lleti ve`attehum vemen saleha min abaihim veezvacihim vezurriyyatihim. inneke ente-l`azizu-lhakim
vekihimu-sseyyiat. vemen teki-sseyyiati yevmeizin fekad rahimteh. vezalike huve-lfevzu-l`azim
inne-llezine keferu yunadevne lemaktu-llahi ekberu mim maktikum enfusekum iz tud`avne ile-l'imani fetekfurun
kalu rabbena emettene-sneteyni veahyeytene-sneteyni fa`terafna bizunubina fehel ila hurucim min sebil
zalikum biennehu iza du`iye-llahu vahdehu kefertum. veiy yusrak bihi tu'minu. felhukmu lillahi-l`aliyyi-lkebir
huve-llezi yurikum ayatihi veyunezzilu lekum mine-ssemai rizka. vema yetezekkeru illa mey yunib
fed`u-llahe muhlisine lehu-ddine velev kerihe-lkafirun
rafi`u-dderacati zu-l`ars. yulki-rruha min emrihi `ala mey yesau min `ibadihi liyunzira yevme-ttelak
yevme hum barizun. la yahfa `ale-llahi minhum sey'un. limeni-lmulku-lyevm. lillahi-lvahidi-lkahhar
elyevme tucza kullu nefsim bima kesebet. la zulme-lyevm. inne-llahe seri`u-lhisab
veenzirhum yevme-l'azifeti izi-lkulubu lede-lhanaciri kazimin. ma lizzalimine min hamimiv vela sefi`iy yuta
ya`lemu hainete-l'a`yuni vema tuhfi-ssudur
vellahu yakdi bilhakk. vellezine yed`une min dunihi la yakdune bisey'. inne-llahe huve-ssemi`u-lbesir
evelem yesiru fi-l'ardi feyenzuru keyfe kane `akibetu-llezine kanu min kablihim. kanu hum esedde minhum kuvvetev veasaran fi-l'ardi feehazehumu-llahu bizunubihim vema kane lehum mine-llahi miv vak
zalike biennehum kanet te'tihim rusuluhum bilbeyyinati fekeferu feehazehumu-llah. innehu kaviyyun sedidu-l`ikab
velekad erselna musa biayatina vesultanim mubin
ila fir`avne vehamane vekarune fekalu sahirun kezzab
felemma caehum bilhakki min `indina kalu-ktulu ebnae-llezine amenu me`ahu vestahyu nisaehum. vema keydu-lkafirine illa fi dalal
vekale fir`avnu zeruni aktul musa velyed`u rabbeh. inni ehafu ey yubeddile dinekum ev ey yuzhira fi-l'ardi-lfesad
vekale musa inni `uztu birabbi verabbikum min kulli mutekebbiril la yu'minu biyevmi-lhisab

vekale raculum mu'min. min ali fir`avne yektumu imanehu etaktulune raculen ey yekule rabbiye-llahu vekad caekum bilbeyyinati mir rabbikum. veiy yeku kaziben fe`aleyhi kezibuh. veiy yeku sadikay yusibkum ba`du-llezi ye`idukum. inne-llahe la yehdi men huve musrifun kezzab
ya kavmi lekumu-lmulku-lyevme zahirine fi-l'ard. femey yensuruna mim be'si-llahi in caena. kale fir`avnu ma urikum illa ma era vema ehdikum illa sebile-rrasad
vekale-llezi amene ya kavmi inni ehafu `aleykum misle yevmi-l'ahzab
misle de'bi kavmi nuhiv ve`adiv vesemude vellezine mim ba`dihim. veme-llahu yuridu zulmel lil`ibad
veya kavmi inni ehafu `aleykum yevme-ttenad
yevme tuvellune mudbirin. ma lekum mine-llahi min `asim. vemey yudlili-llahu fema lehu min had
velekad caekum yusufu min kablu bilbeyyinati fema ziltum fi sekkim mimma caekum bih. hatta iza heleke kultum ley yeb`ase-llahu mim ba`dihi rasula. kezalike yudillu-llahu men huve musrifum murtab
ellezine yucadilune fi ayati-llahi bigayri sultanin etahum. kebura makten `inde-llahi ve`inde-llezine amenu. kezalike yatbe`u-llahu `ala kulli kalbi mutekebbirin cebbar
vekale fir`avnu ya hamanu-bni li sarhal le`alli eblugu-l'esbab
esbabe-ssemavati feettali`a ila ilahi musa veinni leezunnuhu kaziba. vekezalike zuyyine lifir`avne suu `amelihi vesudde `ani-ssebil. vema keydu fir`avne illa fi tebab
vekale-llezi amene ya kavmi-ttebi`uni ehdikum sebile-rrasad
ya kavmi innema hazihi-lhayatu-ddunya meta`. veinne-l'ahirate hiye daru-lkarar
men `amile seyyieten fela yucza illa misleha. vemen `amile saliham min zekerin ev unsa vehuve mu'minun feulaike yedhulune-lcennete yurzekune fiha bigayri hisab
veya kavmi ma li ed`ukum ile-nnecati veted`uneni ile-nnar
ted`uneni liekfura billahi veusrike bihi ma leyse li bihi `ilm. veena ed`ukum ile-l`azizi-lgaffar
la cerame ennema ted`uneni ileyhi leyse lehu da`vetun fi-ddunya vela fi-l'ahirati veenne meraddena ile-llahi veenne-lmusrifine hum ashabu-nnar
fesetezkurune ma ekulu lekum. veufevvidu emri ile-llah. inne-llahe besirum bil`ibad
fevekahu-llahu seyyiati ma mekeru vehaka biali fir`avne suu-l`azab
ennaru yu`radune `aleyha guduvvev ve`asiyya. veyevme tekumu-ssa`ah. edhilu ale fir`avne esedde-l`azab
veiz yetehaccune fi-nnari feyekulu-ddu`afau lillezine-stekberu inna kunna lekum tebe`an fehel entum mugnune `anna nesibem mine-nnar
kale-llezine-stekberu inna kullun fiha inne-llahe kad hakeme beyne-l`ibad
vekale-llezine fi-nnari lihazeneti cehenneme-d`u rabbekum yuhaffif `anna yevmem mine-l`azab
kalu evelem teku te'tikum rusulukum bilbeyyinat. kalu bela. kalu fed`u. vema du`au-lkafirine illa fi dalal
inna lenensuru rusulena vellezine amenu fi-lhayati-ddunya veyevme yekumu-l'eshad
yevme la yenfe`u-zzalimine ma`ziratuhum velehumu-lla`netu velehum suu-ddar
velekad ateyna muse-lhuda veevrasna beni israile-lkitab
hudev vezikra liuli-l'elbab
fasbir inne va`de-llahi hakkuv vestagfir lizembike vesebbih bihamdi rabbike bil`asiyyi vel'ibkar
inne-llezine yucadilune fi ayati-llahi bigayri sultanin etahum in fi sudurihim illa kibrum ma hum bibaligih. feste`iz billah. innehu huve-ssemi`u-lbesir
lehalku-ssemavati vel'ardi ekberu min halki-nnasi velakinne eksera-nnasi la ya`lemun
vema yestevi-l'a`ma velbesiru vellezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati vele-lmusi'. kalilem ma tetezekkerun
inne-ssa`ate leatiyetul la raybe fiha velakinne eksera-nnasi la yu'minun
vekale rabbukumu-d`uni estecib lekum. inne-llezine yestekbirune `an `ibadeti seyedhulune cehenneme dahirin
allahu-llezi ce`ale lekumu-lleyle liteskunu fihi vennehara mubsira. inne-llahe lezu fadlin `ale-nnasi velakinne eksera-nnasi la yeskurun
zalikumu-llahu rabbukum haliku kulli sey'. la ilahe illa hu. feenna tu'fekun
kezalike yu'feku-llezine kanu biayati-llahi yechadun
allahu-llezi ce`ale lekumu-l'arda kararav vessemae binaev vesavverakum feahsene suverakum verazekakum mine-ttayyibat. zalikumu-llahu rabbukum. fetebarake-llahu rabbu-l`alemin
huve-lhayyu la ilahe illa huve fed`uhu muhlisine lehu-ddin. elhamdu lillahi rabbi-l`alemin
kul inni nuhitu en a`bude-llezine ted`une min duni-llahi lemma caeniye-lbeyyinatu mir rabbi veumirtu en uslime lirabbi-l`alemin

huve-llezi halekakum min turabin summe min nutfetin summe min `alekatin summe yuhricukum tiflen summe liteblugu esuddekum summe litekunu suyuha. veminkum mey yuteveffa min kablu veliteblugu ecelem musemmev vele`allekum ta`kilun
huve-llezi yuhyi veyumit. feiza kada emran feinnema yekulu lehu kun feyekun
elem tera ile-llezine yucadilune fi ayati-llah. enna yusrafun
ellezine kezzebu bilkitabi vebima erselna bihi rusulena. fesevfe ya`lemun
izi-l'aglalu fi a`nakihim vesselasil. yushabun
fi-lhamimi summe fi-nnari yuscerun
summe kile lehum eyne ma kuntum tusrikun
min duni-llah. kalu dallu `anna bel lem nekun ned`u min kablu sey'a. kezalike yudillu-llahu-lkafirin
zalikum bima kuntum tefrahune fi-l'ardi bigayri-lhakki vebima kuntum temrahun
udhulu ebvabe cehenneme halidine fiha. febi'se mesve-lmutekebbirin
fasbir inne va`de-llahi hakkun. feimma nuriyenneke ba`da-llezi ne`iduhum ev neteveffeyenneke feileyna yurce`un

velekad erselna rusulem min kablike minhum men kasasna `aleyke veminhum mel lem naksus `aleyk. vema kane lirasulin ey ye'tiye biayetin illa biizni-llah. feiza cae emru-llahi kudiye bilhakki vehasira hunalike-lmubtilun
allahu-llezi ce`ale lekumu-l'en`ame literkebu minha veminha te'kulun
velekum fiha menafi`u veliteblugu `aleyha haceten fi sudurikum ve`aleyha ve`ale-lfulki tuhmelun
veyurikum ayatih. feeyye ayati-llahi tunkirun
efelem yesiru fi-l'ardi feyenzuru keyfe kane `akibetu-llezine min kablihim. kanu eksera minhum veesedde kuvvetev veasaran fi-l'ardi fema agna `anhum ma kanu yeksibun
felemma caethum rusuluhum bilbeyyinati ferihu bima `indehum mine-l`ilmi vehaka bihim ma kanu bihi yestehziun
felemma raev be'sena kalu amenna billahi vahdehu vekeferna bima kunna bihi musrikin
felem yeku yenfe`uhum imanuhum lemma raev be'sena. sunnete-llahi-lleti kad halet fi `ibadih. vehasira hunalike-lkafirun
